channel.title: Theme on Hugo NexT
channel.description: Recent content in Theme on Hugo NexT

item.title: Welcome to the Hugo NexT organization
item.description:
Welcome to the Hugo NexT documentation site! It is from Hexo NexT Transplanted from the theme, specifically designed for Hugo The high-quality and elegant theme created maintains its original simple and easy-to-use features and powerful functions.

Roadmap

At present, the Hugo NexT theme is still under development and improvement. Specific features and the next roadmap details can be found at Hugo NexT V4 Roadmap Please review and feel free to participate in the joint development of PR.
